Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
My name is Lizette, and I’m on the Client Development Team at Bigcommerce. We work with online merchants to help them get started on Bigcommerce and make sure they’re ready for success. Looks like you signed up for a trial with us a few months ago, but decided not to move forward. We’ve recently released a ton of new features that I think will help you increase sales, including new themes, mobile optimization, blogging, easy payments integration and a lot more.
I also noticed that you were looking to switch from your current platform — we’ve started a program to migrate clients from other solutions at no cost if there’s a mutual fit. When would be a good time for a 5-minute call to go over your goals or feedback about Bigcommerce? You can reply to let me know, or call me directly at +1-512-865-4504.
If you’d like to sign up for another free trial to check out the new features, you can do that here - http://www.bigcommerce.com/p/12876.html

“We got our first sale the same day we switched from another platform and now our numbers are up over 15%.” — Pat Hardy, hipfit.com
Thanks in advance for your time!
